sch:let.name: Simple
sch:let.value: doc:CreditNote/cbc:ProfileID = 'Procurement-OrdSimR-BilSim-1.0' or doc:CreditNote/cbc:ProfileID = 'Procurement-OrdAdv-BilSim-1.0' or doc:CreditNote/cbc:ProfileID = 'urn:www.nesubl.eu:profiles:profile7:ver1.0' or doc:CreditNote/cbc:ProfileID = 'urn:www.nesubl.eu:profiles:profile7:ver2.0'

sch:pattern.name: UBLExtensions
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the UBLExtensions class

sch:pattern.name: Profile
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating root element, Profile and UBL version

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN001] Root element must be CreditNote
[F-CRN204] The documenttype does not match an OIOUBL CreditNote and can not be validated by this schematron.

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN002] There must be an OrderReference class for this profileID

sch:pattern.name: CreditNote
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the CreditNote structure

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN004] Invalid DocumentCurrencyCode. Must contain a value
[F-CRN005] One or more TaxTotal class must be present
[F-CRN006] Invalid CreditNote/ID (Creditnote number). Must contain a value.
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN159] No more than one InvoicePeriod class may be present
[F-CRN007] There is a LineExtensionAmount for one or more CreditNoteLines where the currencyID does not equal the DocumentCurrencyCode
[F-CRN008] There is a LineExtensionAmount where the currencyID does not equal the DocumentCurrencyCode
[F-CRN009] There is a PayableAmount where the currencyID does not equal the DocumentCurrencyCode

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN011] TaxCurrencyCode must be either DKK or EUR
[F-CRN013] One TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount element must be present when TaxCurrencyCode element is used
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN209] There is a TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount where the currencyID does not equal the TaxCurrencyCode ('').
[F-CRN014] There is a PriceAmount where the currencyID does not equal the PricingCurrencyCode
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN015] One PricingExchangeRate class must be present when PricingCurrencyCode element is used
[F-CRN016] One PaymentExchangeRate class must be present when PaymentCurrencyCode element is used
[F-CRN017] One PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate class must be present when PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode element is used

sch:pattern.name: InvoicePeriod
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the InvoicePeriod class

sch:pattern.name: DiscrepancyResponse
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the DiscrepancyResponse class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN161] Invalid ReferenceID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN188] Use either ResponseCode or Description
[F-CRN018] Invalid listID. Must be ''
[F-CRN160] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be ''
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN193] Invalid ResponseCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:pattern.name: OrderReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OrderReference class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN022] Invalid OrderReference/ID. Must contain a value.

sch:pattern.name: BillingReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the BillingReference class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN023] DebitNoteDocumentReference class must be excluded
[F-CRN024] AdditionalDocumentReference class must be excluded
[F-CRN162] BillingReferenceLine class must be excluded

sch:pattern.name: DespatchDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OriginatorDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: ReceiptDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ReceiptDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: ContractDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ContractDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: AdditionalDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AdditionalDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: Signature
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Signature class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN025] Invalid Signature/ID. Must contain a value.

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN163] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: AccountingSupplierParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AccountingSupplierParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN026] DataSendingCapability element must be excluded
[F-CRN027] Party class must be present
[F-CRN028] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN031] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:pattern.name: AccountingCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AccountingCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN039] One Party class must be present
[F-CRN040] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN042] One Contact class must be present
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN164] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN047] Invalid AccountingCustomerParty/Contact/ID. Must contain a value.

sch:pattern.name: PayeeParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PayeeParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN166] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: TaxRepresentativeParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TaxRepresentativeParty class

sch:pattern.name: TaxExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TaxExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: PricingExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PricingExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: PaymentExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PaymentExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: AllowanceCharge
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AllowanceCharge class

sch:pattern.name: TaxTotal
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TaxTotal class

sch:pattern.name: LegalMonetaryTotal
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the LegalMonetaryTotal class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN066] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN068] AllowanceTotalAmount is mandatory when AllowanceCharge classes (with ChargeIndicator='false') are present
[F-CRN069] ChargeTotalAmount is mandatory when AllowanceCharge classes (with ChargeIndicator='true') are present
[F-CRN071] PayableRoundingAmount is mandatory when TaxTotal/RoundingAmount elements are present
[F-CRN072] The sum of CreditNoteLine/LineExtensionAmount ('') elements must equal LineExtensionAmount ('')
[F-CRN073] The sum of TaxTotal/TaxSubtotal/TaxAmount elements must equal TaxExclusiveAmount

sch:report.test: cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount and not(format-number(cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount, '##.00') = format-number(sum(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) + sum(../cac:TaxTotal/cac:TaxSubtotal/cbc:TaxAmount) + sum(cbc:ChargeTotalAmount) - sum(cbc:AllowanceTotalAmount) + sum(cbc:PayableRoundingAmount), '##.00'))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN074] TaxInclusiveAmount is calculated incorrectly
[F-CRN075] The sum of AllowanceCharge/Amount elements (with ChargeIndicator='false') must equal AllowanceTotalAmount
[F-CRN076] The sum of AllowanceCharge/Amount elements (with ChargeIndicator='true') must equal cbc:ChargeTotalAmount
[F-CRN078] The sum of TaxTotal/RoundingAmount elements must equal PayableRoundingAmount
[F-CRN208] The LegalMonetaryTotal/PayableRoundingAmount must NOT be less then -10.00 or greater then 10.00.
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN079] PayableAmount is calculated incorrectly - PayableAmount ('' ) don't match total calculation ('' )

sch:pattern.name: CreditNoteLine
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the CreditNoteLine class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN196] Invalid CreditedQuantity. Must contain a value
[F-CRN081] One or more TaxTotal class must be present
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN082] One Item class must be present when CreditNoteLine/BillingReference is not specified
[F-CRN083] One Price class must be present when CreditNoteLine/BillingReference is not specified
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN084] Invalid CreditNoteLine/ID. Must contain a value.
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN203] AllowanceCharge.Amount can not be negative, if CreditedQuantity or Price.PriceAmount is not negative.

[W-CRN154] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () cannot be evaluated since either 'cbc:CalculationRate', 'cbc:MathematicOperatorCode' or both are not present in 'CreditNote/cac:PricingExchangeRate'

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN212] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal CreditedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate) (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN213] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal ((Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * CreditedQuantity ()) * CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN198] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * CreditedQuantity () * CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00.

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN214] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (CreditedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate ()) div CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN215] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal ((Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * CreditedQuantity ()) div CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN199] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * CreditedQuantity () div CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00.

[F-CRN194] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal CreditedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate () +/- 1.00 (CreditedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

[F-CRN210] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * CreditedQuantity () +/- 1.00 (CreditedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)
[F-CRN216] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * CreditedQuantity () +/- 1.00.

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN200] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal CreditedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate () * CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply') +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN217] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * CreditedQuantity () * CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply') +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN218] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * CreditedQuantity * CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply') +/- 1.00.

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and (((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN201] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (CreditedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate ()) div CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide') +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and (((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN219] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal ((Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * CreditedQuantity ()) div CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide') +/- 1.00 (CreditNotedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and (((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN220] CreditNote line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * CreditedQuantity () div CreditNote.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide') +/- 1.00.
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN207] For each CreditNoteLine, LineExtensionAmount must be present and contain a value.
[F-CRN088] Invalid CreditedQuantity. Must not be zero

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN089] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals
[F-CRN090] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. No more than 4 decimals

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN168] Invalid ReferenceID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN169] Use either ResponseCode or Description

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN091] Invalid listID. Must be 'urn:oioubl:codelist:lineresponsecode-1.0'
[F-CRN167] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '320'
[F-CRN170] Invalid LineID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN171] Invalid LineID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN172] DebitNoteDocumentReference class must be excluded
[F-CRN173] AdditionalDocumentReference class must be excluded
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN174] No more than one BillingReferenceLine class may be present
[F-CRN175] No more than one AllowanceCharge class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN098] LatestDeliveryDate element must be excluded
[F-CRN099] LatestDeliveryTime element must be excluded
[F-CRN157] DeliveryAddress class must be excluded
[F-CRN100] PromisedDeliveryPeriod class must be excluded
[F-CRN101] EstimatedDeliveryPeriod class must be excluded

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN158] Address is mandatory when ID is not specified
[F-CRN176] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN109] OriginCountry class must be excluded
[F-CRN110] Invalid Name for InvoiceLine. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CRN177] No more than one Keyword element may be present
[F-CRN178] No more than one BrandName element may be present
[F-CRN179] No more than one ModelName element may be present
[F-CRN180] No more than one ManufacturersItemIdentification class may be present
[F-CRN181] No more than one AdditionalItemIdentification class may be present
[F-CRN182] No more than one ItemSpecificationDocumentReference class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN115] Invalid SellersItemIdentification/ID. Must contain a value.
[F-CRN119] Invalid Description. Must contain a value
[F-CRN118] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN189] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-CRN132] Use a Valid UNSPSC 19.0501 code

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN133] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-CRN151] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CRN152] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN190] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-CRN191] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CRN192] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN185] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-CRN186] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CRN187] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CRN203] cbc:ID must contain a value.
[F-CRN211] Invalid cac:CertificateTypeCode: '' Must be a value from the codelist: PackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode from GS1 Global Data Dictionary.
[F-CRN204] cac:CertificateTypeCode must contain a value.
[F-CRN205] cbc:CertificateType must contain a value.

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-CRN139] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-CRN140] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CRN141] Invalid listID. Must be 'UN/ECE 5387'
